column4: By the way guys, i must say, Linux handles my Nvidia card/chipset MUCH better than Vista did :D
The only thing Vista is good for is a door-stop.
:P sounsd painful, but symbolically acceptable

xD, Even when my gfx card was on the restricted drivers, it ran better than on Vista, i wish i could use some programs like i can use on Windows, but thats way less than what Linux has given me so far :D
I'm only on windows for a few reasons: 1 World of Warcraft 2: Progress Quest. Although I havn't tried PQ in Wine yet.
I am using WoW perfectly with Cedega, im getting 60FPS inside of Stormwind :P
Don't you have to pay for Cedega?
yes, but its $15 (3 month min. purchase) and then if you no longer pay for the sub. you dont get updates, but you still get to use the program ;)
Free WoW on XP or 15$ for the same thing and not needing to reboot... Hmm..
id go with the $15 one time fee, just so i dont have to reboot ;)
lol, I'm fine with rebooting for now. We'll see in a few weeks as I transition to Kubuntu nearly 100%
I have an ATI Radeon 1400 Mobility and Fiesty isn't <3ing it.
ahhh, ATI :S, that sucks lol
What other games have you tried on Cedega?
just WoW xD, i may try a few others just to see how they handle, such as Civ4, C&C3, and maybe AoE: 3
What server?
i play on a few, but my main is on Kul'Tiras
I'm in Whisperwind.
uber stabby guy, xD, i have a 67 NE Hunter :P
Yeah not many can take me down around my level. I have out DPSed most guys +5 levels above me
nice, i dont PvP much on my hunter anymore, the taurens dont like my DPS :P, especially the shamans lmao
